entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as making snide allusions to Harry for months. It is described as a source of information that makes Harry's situation real to him.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is Harry's friend and godfather's son. He is advising Ron to drop Harry and tell tales on him to Umbridge.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is being advised by Percy to drop Harry.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the person to whom Percy is advising Ron to tell tales about Harry.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and is in a similar situation as Harry. He is the only person who can understand how Harry feels at the moment.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is feeling unbalanced and possibly violent according to Percy.

relationships.description: Percy is advising Ron to drop Harry and tell tales on him to Umbridge. This relationship is described as Percy's actions towards Ron.
Percy is informing Umbridge about Harry through Ron. This relationship is described as Percy's actions towards Umbridge.
Sirius can understand how Harry feels at the moment because he is in a similar situation. This relationship is described as Sirius' ability to empathize with Harry.
